## isConstructor() function

Typeguard for constructors. Only really validates that `it` is a function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isConstructor(it: unknown): it is Constructor<unknown, AnyOptions>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  it | unknown |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

it is [Constructor](./noicejs.constructor.md)<!-- -->&lt;unknown, AnyOptions&gt;
